name: Chicken Hell!
description:
The Game

The game is based on a true event that happened in Brazil, January 5, 2019. A wave of attacks by some factions started after some declarations made by a Secretary of Penitentiary administration about more rigorous inspection in prisons.

The game represents in a satire way, a event that happened in the date above where a group of bandits burned a truck containing 2.000 chickens

Controls

MOVE → W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys

Fire → Mouse Left Button

Back to main menu → HOLD ESCAPE (AKA-ESC) for a few seconds
